attributes.additional_details:
Not only have we all had enough of it but with austerirty measures we cant afford it.
Whats wrong with telling the electorate the truth for a change,
In Ukraine we see armed terrorist/opposition snipers, we see petrol bombs thrown at the police and our government publically supports this.
We are told it is indefensible for the police government of Ukraine to fire in their defense. The only Brits who support this view are in government.
Why doesn't government say we support the terrorists because we don't like the Ukraine Government. No right thinking member of the public likes to see or approves of public violence. When you use tax money to promote things like this you shame Britain.
